field.name: plan_id
field.label: Plan
field.query: SELECT plan_id AS value, title AS plan_id FROM #__payplans_plan WHERE published = 1
field.description: If you set both Plan and Group in Parameters then higher priority will be given to the Plan

field.name: group_id
field.label: Group
field.query: SELECT group_id AS value, title AS group_id FROM #__payplans_group WHERE published = 1
field.description: If you set both Plan and Group in Parameters then higher priority will be given to the Plan
